Reviews.Title: I got what I paid for
Reviews.Author: Kcsmom
Reviews.Content: I am not a phone snob so it doesn't take much to please me.  This phone is very basic and low maintenance but its enough for me.  If you like the bells and whitsles don't get this phone you will not be pleased.  I just needed something to talk on and keep my calendar.  I got what I paid for.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Intercept
Reviews.Author: Tisha bostic
Reviews.Content: the phone is ok, i thought it was new but its used, in good condition though, i am satisfied with the phone fr the price i got it for..

Reviews.Title: did not like it
Reviews.Author: veronica vasquez
Reviews.Content: Item did not meet my expectations.very slow no memory left to update or add contacts.sound was not good.

Reviews.Title: Bell's phone
Reviews.Author: Big Rob
Reviews.Content: The phone was for my daughter and she loves it.  She's only 8' she loves the key board feature.  She texts me all the time.

Reviews.Title: Just not what I wanted..
Reviews.Author: Taylor
Reviews.Content: Its slow, it hardly works. The person who sold it owed Sprint close to $500, so I had to deal with all of that. It has keys on the keypad that do not work. Overall, terrible phone and would not reccommend to anyone at all.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: nana
Reviews.Content: I loved this phone but the screen got wet and now it's not working.  I hated not having it anymore.

Reviews.Title: It does have some issues
Reviews.Author: C. Cramblet "ccramblet"
Reviews.Content: This is not a bad phone...especially at the right price.  It does "freeze" up like some other reviewers wrote, but is an stylish and full-featured phone...my daughter likes it.  Give it a BIG memory card to save yourself some grief.

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: sumerleigh
Reviews.Content: It is a cute phone when first got the phone it was working good but that same night kept saying battery was disconnected .also sometimes would say charger wasdisconnected. it would charge some but would not hold charge and would immediately die after. I ordered a new battery going to see if that works ill keep u posted

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Phone
Reviews.Author: WJPC "WJPC"
Reviews.Content: I have this phone and really just plain LOVE it. It has a QWERTY keyboard that slides out and I can type in my text messages really fast. It is light and works on Android so it is really quick system. I am thinking of buying one for my mother once I get the money for it. It is pretty cheap.

Reviews.Title: Devolucion
Reviews.Author: Rudith
Reviews.Content: No me funciona en venezuela, necesito saber si me pueden cambiar el equipo. por otro equipo que me funcione en mi pais
